attributes.action: Restrict Refuse Collection to night time like Spain to ease traffic congestion.
attributes.additional_details: http://content.tfl.gov.uk/veolia-commercial-out-of-hours-case-study.pdf Veolia Environmental Services carried out a case study for out of hours waste collection. It was deemed a success, endorsing the effectiveness of TfL’s quiet delivery code of practice. They also recorded efficiency improvements of shift productivity, reduced duty times and vehicle fuel consumption.
attributes.background: Restricting refuse collection to out of hours would ease congestion on our roads and with a quite delivery code of practice they would improve shift productivity, reduce duty times and vehicle fuel consumption saving money, emissions and time for all.
